t: LI iced tea brand sees sales triple under new ownership - Newsday
s: February 13, 2017 - While his early challenges included ... Montauk Beverageworks’ biggest setback came in 2012: superstorm Sandy. Smyth’s fully stocked warehouse in Island Park was flooded 5 feet deep, and nearly all his merchandise was destroyed. “I lost everything I had worked so hard for overnight,” he said. Smyth halted business operations for six months to “rethink and regroup, but this time with a lot less funds.” · “Eventually, I had to sell the company to keep the brand going,” ...
